meanings.definition: A sequence of movements in martial arts.
meanings.sent1: The sensei demonstrated a new kata to the students.
meanings.sent2: Practicing the kata helps improve focus and discipline.
meanings.sent3: During the tournament, the kata performed a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: Her kata was like a graceful dance, flowing effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The kata was so intricate, it felt like solving a puzzle.

meanings.definition: A formalized pattern of movements in karate.
meanings.sent1: The black belt students practiced the kata diligently.
meanings.sent2: In karate class, they learned a new kata every week.
meanings.sent3: The kata competition had everyone in stitches with laughter.
meanings.sent4: His kata was a powerful display of strength and precision.
meanings.sent5: The kata echoed through the dojo, filling it with energy.

meanings.definition: A traditional Japanese form of exercise.
meanings.sent1: The group gathered in the park to practice the kata together.
meanings.sent2: Kata is a great way to stay active and healthy.
meanings.sent3: The kata session turned into a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: Her daily kata routine was like a soothing ritual.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of kata lies in its simplicity and grace.
